products.name: Maybelline New York Super Stay Vinyl Ink Liquid Lipstick, Instant Shine Lasts Up To 16H - Charmed(4.2ml)

reviews.title: Good..??
reviews.content:
I got it on NYKAA PINK FRIDAY SALE so on price point it was a good deal for me.. A good everyday shade.. but won’t recommend to use it everyday because can cause damage to your lips since it’s very hard to remove.. Obviously it’s heavy on lips.. I apply lip balm underneath so it transfers a bit.. also tried without lip balm and it doesn’t transfer.. stays all day long until you remove it.. 
Can have all kind of foods even thought it stays well.. one swipe pigmentation.. 
Overall it’s worth buying but NOT A MUST HAVE

Overall, I'm quite satisfied with the formula as it strikes a good balance between comfort and longevity.
